item.title: Setup A Gaming VM
item.description: Before starting First thing first. The reason why I prefer a gaming Windows VM rather than a native Windows box is becuase I found that most of time my works can be done on Linux. There is no reason to run a huge spyware all the time. Besides Windows is getting worse and worse. I can feel that the PC is much slower on Windowss. So it’s time to ditch it as well as get rid of tons of spyware.
